name: Kiss me
detailed_description:
Leila is a secretary in a huge company. A pretty sexy woman who just want to do her job well, but the office plankton is haunting her. All those office rats felt in love with her and are trying to do their best to kiss Leila. But she is not interested in their kisses, because she is a lesbian and is not interested in men. So she is doing all her best to escape.

Help Leila to escape from annoying men in her office:
Go from one door to another to find the exit in the shortest time
Some doors may be closed, so you must find the key
You must run away or jump over the men to escape
Remember, if they will catch her, they will kiss her and it will kill her, so you will have to start the level from the beginning!

Kiss me is a funny game to kill the time:
- simple graphics
- easy controls
- 24 levels
- and many many kisses)

Controls:
W or arrow up - jump
A or arrow left - move left
D or arrow right - move right
S or arrow down - action

short_description: Help pretty woman to escape from annoying men

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game include personages dressed only in underwear or naked at all.
